Name: CubeHub
About the game: This is a collection of mini-games based on innovative game mechanics and parodying famous games and other works of modern culture with its help. This is a physics challenge with puzzle elements. Gameplay At the game level are various figures. Your goal: to put the figures so that they intersect certain parts. The game marks these parts with a pink color. Using the keyboard, you control one of the figures: rotation, movement back and forth. You can push other figures. Some figures may have AI and move independently of the player. Some figures can “shoot” cubes, they push the figures too. At different levels, different settings for gravity and destructibility of the environment. Game features Many figures of different shapes and colors. Tutorial levels. Different game levels. From simple and funny to very complex, from which you will break the keyboard and your nerves. The game develops attentiveness, precision of movements, intelligence and a sense of rhythm. This is a fun game for the whole family. Play it with your friends, parents, children, grandparents. Play it at work so that your boss can see that you are increasing your intellectual level and become more useful for the company.
